Articles.Content:
SSI is looking for shuttlecraft candidates and I am looking for a VTOL tech that I can pilfer and perfect into an SSI classified Kerbin-Mun shuttlecraft.

I just need the simplest tech to get the job done. I can do the aestethics. Cupcake's tech is one such engine design I'm thinking about pilfering. Anyone have other ideas? Have you built a Kerbin-Mun VTOL that doesnt shed parts?

Mods pls dont move this thread to rocket builders. I want this thread to showcase possible VTOL tech that can get the job done.
I will have to attemp this one when I get home. My SSTO can make it to the mun but it isn't a VTOL. Easier said than done when Cupcake isn't around.
